attributes.action: Israel must stop fighting and killing innocent people in GAZA (palstain)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I/we urge to the UK government to put more pressure on Israel to stop the violence, before its too late, The Israeli forces already been killed more then a thousand people and make injuries up to three thousand or more, among the bigteam most of them are civilian(children/woman)  I strongly believe that the UK government could stop the violence if they move with correct intention.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
